tasks.label: Make and apply migrations for SiteText
tasks.command: python ./manage.py makemigrations web && python ./manage.py migrate && python ./manage.py check

tasks.label: Create and apply SiteImage migration
tasks.command: python ./manage.py makemigrations web && python ./manage.py migrate && python ./manage.py check

tasks.label: Remigrate expanded SiteText seed data
tasks.command: python ./manage.py migrate web 0030_seed_sitetext_defaults --reverse && python ./manage.py migrate web 0030_seed_sitetext_defaults && python ./manage.py check

tasks.label: Apply expanded SiteText seed migration
tasks.command: python ./manage.py migrate web 0029_siteimage_alter_sitetext_value && python ./manage.py migrate web 0030_seed_sitetext_defaults && python ./manage.py check

tasks.label: Apply final SiteText migration with all pages
tasks.command: python ./manage.py migrate web 0029_siteimage_alter_sitetext_value && python ./manage.py migrate web 0030_seed_sitetext_defaults && python ./manage.py check

tasks.label: Apply final extended SiteText migration
tasks.command: python ./manage.py migrate web 0029_siteimage_alter_sitetext_value && python ./manage.py migrate web 0030_seed_sitetext_defaults && python ./manage.py check
